txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive goblin, Skrizug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

As you inspect Skrizug's dagger, you notice what appears to be a crude, white hand carved into its hilt. It seems even the goblins of Cardolan have begun to fall under the sway of the White Hand.

You should bring this trophy to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
Deliver Skrizug's dagger to Gaerion in Cardolan

Gaerion can be found at Sírlond in Cardolan.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Cardolan. You should deliver it to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
After encountering the elusive goblin, Skrizug, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

'Greetings! Have you found something of note?'

Gaerion inspects Skrizug's dagger, pausing when he sees the insignia of the White Hand.

'This bodes ill for Cardolan, friend. If the White Hand seeks for allies among the goblins and Orcs of the North, it will not need to try hard to find them. It seems to me the best course is to destroy these objects or keep them hidden from sight—or perhaps I am wrong, and the best course is to bear them in sight of the goblins and confuse their loyalties.

'Nay, I shall have to think upon this lest I play into the hands of the Enemy. Thank you, [placeholder]!'
